mapper.select:
SELECT D.`POINTCODE` AS pointCode, D.`POLLUTECODE` AS polluteCode, `DATATIME` AS dataTime, `DATAVALUE` AS dataValue, `ISVALIDED` AS isValided, `MAXVALUE` AS `maxValue`, `MINVALUE` AS `minValue`, `DATAFLAG` AS dataFlag, AUDITVALUE as auditValue, DATASTATUS as dataStatus, P.ISAUDIT AS isAudit, P.NUMPRECISION AS numPrecision, R.SYSTEMTYPE AS ST FROM ${tableName} AS D,T_DIC_STDPOLLCODE AS P ,T_DIC_SYSTYPE_POLLCODE_REL AS R where D.POLLUTECODE = P.POLLUTECODE AND P.CODECLASS = R.CODECLASS AND R.SYSTEMTYPE='${systemType}'
AND D.pointCode='${pointCode}'
AND DATATIME >='${beginTime}'
AND DATATIME < '${endTime}'
AND D.POLLUTECODE IN
'${code}'

SELECT D.`POINTCODE` AS pointCode, D.`POLLUTECODE` AS polluteCode, `DATATIME` AS dataTime, `AVGVALUE` AS dataValue, `MAXVALUE` AS `maxValue`, `MINVALUE` AS `minValue`, `ISVALIDED` AS isValided, `DATAFLAG` AS dataFlag, P.NUMPRECISION AS numPrecision, R.SYSTEMTYPE AS ST FROM ${tableName} D,T_DIC_STDPOLLCODE P ,T_DIC_SYSTYPE_POLLCODE_REL R where D.POLLUTECODE = P.POLLUTECODE AND P.CODECLASS = R.CODECLASS AND R.SYSTEMTYPE='${systemType}' AND MONITORTYPE='${dataType}' AND D.pointCode='${pointCode}'
AND DATATIME >='${beginTime}'
AND DATATIME < '${endTime}'
AND D.POLLUTECODE IN
'${code}'

SELECT DISTINCT DATATIME AS dataTime FROM ${tableName} AS R, V_BAS_STATIONPOLLINFO AS P WHERE R.POINTCODE = P.POINTCODE AND R.POLLUTECODE = P.POLLUTECODE AND P.POLLUTECLASS = 'PolluteClass44' AND IFNULL(R.DATAVALUE, 0) >= 1 AND R.pointCode='${pointCode}'
AND DATATIME >='${beginTime}'
AND DATATIME < '${endTime}'
order by DATATIME asc

SELECT DISTINCT pollutecode, pollutename, numPrecision FROM T_DIC_STDPOLLCODE a, T_DIC_SYSTYPE_POLLCODE_REL b WHERE a.CODECLASS = b.CODECLASS AND systemtype = 22 AND pollutecode IN ( 'a05024', 'a21004', 'a21005', 'a21026', 'a34002', 'a34004', 'a83006', 'a83004', 'a83005', 'a83003', 'a83002', 'a83001' )
SELECT POLLUTECODE FROM T_DIC_STDPOLLCODE WHERE POLLUTECLASS = 'PolluteClass99'
SELECT pointCode, polluteCode, max(hhcycletime) as hhcycletime, MAX(ISSTAT) AS ISSTAT FROM V_BAS_STATIONPOLLINFO group by pointCode, polluteCode

SELECT DISTINCT a.POINTCODE AS pointCode, b.STDPOINTCODE AS MN, DATATIME AS dataTime, MICYCLETIME AS mInterval, RTCYCLETIME AS rInterval FROM ${tableName} a, T_PS_BAS_POINTLIST b WHERE a.POINTCODE = b.POINTCODE AND DATATIME BETWEEN '${beginTime}' AND '${endTime}'

SELECT DISTINCT pointcode, datatime FROM T_BAS_AUDITRECORD WHERE audittype IN (1, 3) AND pointCode='${pointCode}'
AND AUDITTIME >='${beginTime}'
AND AUDITTIME < '${endTime}'
order by datatime desc

SELECT D.POINTCODE AS pointCode, DATATIME AS dataTime FROM ${tableName} AS D,T_DIC_STDPOLLCODE AS P where D.POLLUTECODE = P.POLLUTECODE AND (DATASTATUS=0 OR DATASTATUS is null) AND ISAUDIT=1 AND D.pointCode='${pointCode}'
AND DATATIME >='${beginTime}'
AND DATATIME < '${endTime}'
order by datatime desc

SELECT POLLUTECODE, SMAXVALUE, TTYPE AS polluteClass FROM T_DIC_POLLSTD A LEFT JOIN T_DIC_POLLSTD_DETAIL B ON A.SCODE = B.SCODE WHERE A.SYSTEMTYPE = '22' AND A.SCODE = '106' AND B.TTYPE IN ('timeType03', 'timeType04')
SELECT * FROM T_ENV_MONI_AIR_HVYDAY_STAT WHERE EDATETIME IS NULL
SELECT * FROM T_ENV_MONI_AIR_OPREC WHERE ETIME IS NULL

SELECT CODE, max(DATATIME)AS DATATIME ,`LEVEL` FROM (SELECT CODE,(CASE WHEN AQI<=200 THEN DATATIME ELSE NULL END)AS DATATIME,`LEVEL` FROM T_ENV_MONI_AIR_AQIDD WHERE 1=1
AND DATATIME >='${beginTime}'
AND DATATIME <= '${endTime}'
AND dataStatus = '0')A GROUP BY A.CODE,A.`LEVEL`
